Name: Nutty Pear
Ingredients: 45 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass over champagne.
Review: As the name suggests pear and almond are the main flavours with calvados providing backbone and hints of apple, while champagne dries and adds effervescence.
History: Created in September 2014 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Nutty Pear contains 193 calories
